column5: Received emails from both companies today:  http://www.cabelas.com/browse.cmd?categoryId=1715190480&WT.tsrc=EML&eid=12852215&WT.mc_id=email-nl%7CEP20170925%7CEPP3ALL%7C12912%7CMAINFEAT1
Well it seems like they are working to make it a smooth transition?

Not sure what, if anything it has to do with the amalgamation but bps revamped their website a month or so ago and it's terrible. It makes me hate going there to look for stuff.  Gift cards can be "swapped" but you need to contact a 1 800 number or customer service in store. Not sure if things are a little different here in Canada.
